Interface ISchedule.Item.Calendar.Time

    public static interface ISchedule.Item.Calendar.Time

    • Method Detail

      • getStart

        java.lang.String getStart()
        Get the first run time. Time is a 24-hour clock formatted as hh:mm:ss where :ss is optional.
        Returns:
        the first run time

      • getRecurring

        java.lang.String getRecurring()
        Get the time between runs. Time is a 24-hour clock formatted as hh:mm:ss where :ss is optional.
        Returns:
        the time between runs or null if not recurring

      • getUntil

        java.lang.String getUntil()
        Get the last run time. Time is a 24-hour clock formatted as hh:mm:ss where :ss is optional.
        Returns:
        the last run time or null if not recurring

      • setStart

        void setStart(java.lang.String start)
        Set the first run time. Time is a 24-hour clock formatted as hh:mm:ss where :ss is optional.
        Parameters:
        start - the first run time

      • setRecurring

        void setRecurring(java.lang.String recurring)
        Set the time between runs. Time is a 24-hour clock formatted as hh:mm:ss where :ss is optional.
        Parameters:
        recurring - the time between runs or null if not recurring

      • setUntil

        void setUntil(java.lang.String until)
        Set the last run time. Time is a 24-hour clock formatted as hh:mm:ss where :ss is optional.
        Parameters:
        until - the last run time or null if not recurring
